channel.title: Tech Sector on FinanClub
channel.description: Recent content in Tech Sector on FinanClub

item.title: META
item.description: score:-82 Chances: The 2023 Q4 cycle has been primarily positive, underpinned by the Tech sector’s strong contribution. Meta Platforms is getting considerable traction for Reels viewership on its flagship Facebook site, and Reels now accounts for a third of all video watched on Facebook.

item.title: CRM
item.description: score:134 Chances: Salesforce (CRM) has been performing well in the market and has seen a significant increase in stock value in the past year. The company’s solutions in sales force automation, customer service, marketing automation, and digital commerce make it well-positioned for future growth.

item.title: CRWD
item.description: score:172 Chances: CrowdStrike (CRWD) has received quite a bit of attention from Zacks.com users lately. Shares of cybersecurity company CrowdStrike (NASDAQ:CRWD) jumped 5.4% in the afternoon session after Morgan Stanley analyst Hamza Fodderwala upgraded the stock’s rating from Equal-Weight (Hold) to Overweight (Buy) and raised the price target from $203 to $304.
